channel.title: No Response From Login Server
channel.description:
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/e265238a09ff14f2351c193e3372a787.png[/img] I get no response from loginserver, please try again in 5 seconds.
I get this when someone tries to enter my server, I can enter it perfectly fine.

item.title: No Response From Login Server
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

From what you have said:
Your server is running.
Something in your network is blocking their connection.

Possibilities:
Router/Firewall - likely
Client - highly likely
Computer/Firewall -less likely

ISP - not likely
Donâ€™t ask how to fix it unless you supply ample information about it, proving you have some decent computer skills and know how.
Computer:
Did you: unblock ports?
Did you: change the ip in the client?
Do you: have a no-ip, or other means to have a static ip address?
Router:
Did you forward your port?
Did you unblock anonymous traffic to your network(linksys)?

Read full topic
